<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Thunderous Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=1044)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Requirements** You're wielding a melee weapon in two hands.
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You swing your massive weapon, creating a wave of sonic vibrations that topples creatures. Make a melee Strike with your two-handed weapon. Each creature in a 15-foot cone from you must attempt a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save against your spell DC or take 2 sonic damage. On a critical failure, the creature is knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31). The target of your Strike must be within the cone or the effect fails.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1.
